name: Excessively Complex Data Representation
description: The software uses an unnecessarily complex internal representation for its data structures or interrelationships between those structures.
extended_description: <xhtml:p>This issue makes it more difficult to understand or maintain the software, which indirectly affects security by making it more difficult or time-consuming to find and/or fix vulnerabilities.  It also might make it easier to introduce vulnerabilities.</xhtml:p>
